casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Tony JOHNSON. No. 210P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 24, 2006. C. Scott Holmes, Durham, for Tony Johnson. L. Johnson Britt, III, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st day of April 2006 by the Attorney General for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 24th day of April 2006."
